title: You've Been Touched
description: Char and Riley have encountered pain and heartache in the past. They were sure that they would never meet someone that would heal their hearts and allow them to love again. Then, on an ordinary Sunday, a newspaper in a minimart changes their lives forever. Although they share a strong physical connection, they ultimately hunger for one another’s emotional touch.No matter how hard they’ve tried to stay away from each other, the magnetic force between them has always remained strong.Char and Riley have been through it all; love and loss, trust and deceit. They are the glue that holds their Boston family together and the ones that would be lost without the love and support of their family and friends.Today is the day we’ve all waited for—the magical moment when two lives become one. Riley Paul Kincaid & Charlotte Jayde TaylorRequest the pleasure of your companyto celebrate their wedding.On Friday February 14, 2014atSt. Elizabeth’s ChurchBoston, MassachusettsRSVPAuthor t. h. snyderEvening Invitation
author: T.H. Snyder
